@thebestof


The reason why we choose AAC audio file is because
1) It's size is smaller meaning it's easier and quicker to upload

and 2) The only format that allows the CLEAN logo



Besides, AAC audio file is not that bad, it's still encoded with iTunes 10.2.2.12
